entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning late this evening. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 8:19 PM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
